document_data.name: Assassins Guild of the Galenas
document_data.orgname: the Assassins Guild of the Galenas
document_data.mainbody: The '''Assassins Guild of the Galenas''', also called the '''Citadel of Assassins''', was an [[assassin]]s [[guild]] based in the [[Galena Mountains]] in [[Damara]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
The Guild was once loyal to [[Zhengyi]], the Witch-King, and remained an enemy to the throne of the [[Bloodstone Lands]].<ref>

In the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, [[Bregan D'aerthe]], under the orders of [[Jarlaxle]] (and with the consent of [[Kimmuriel Oblodra]]) easily infiltrated a base of the guild and forcefully recruited Knellict as an ally, thus bringing the Citadel of Assassins under the influence of the [[drow]] mercenary organization.
document_data.Organization: As of [[1372 DR]], the leader of the guild was [[Timoshenko]], the [[Grandfather of Assassins]], who played the political face of the organization. His chief lieutenant, the wizard [[Knellict]], carried out the dirty work.

Base of Operations.Notable Members:
* [[Athrogate]], a dwarven warrior
* [[Canthan Doolittle]], a human wizard
* [[Ellery Dragonsbane]], a relative of [[Gareth Dragonsbane]] and a commander of the Army of Bloodstone
* [[Felix]], a human soldier
* [[Knellict]], a human archmage and Timoshenko's lieutenant
* [[Timoshenko]], the Grandfather of Assassins and the Citadel's official leader
